name: Breach of Contract Online
description: Breach of Contract Online is the new Last Man Standing/Battle Royale Game you've been wanting! Play it Free! Breach of Contract Online's open-world environment brings so much to the table.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista, 7/8/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Mac OS X 10.8 and above Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
